title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions: Introducing the Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles! This dual-sided long handle back scrubber is the perfect body exfoliator for wet or dry brushing. The 17-inch wooden handle features non-slip rubber patches and a hanging rope for easy storage. The soft bristles are made of gentle nylon, ideal for effectively washing and cleaning your skin, while the stiff bristles, made of natural material, exfoliate your skin, leaving it smooth and rejuvenated. This versatile brush can be used for both wet and dry brushing, and with recommended replacement every 3-6 months and regular cleaning every few weeks, it's a durable and long-lasting addition to your self-care routine. Pamper yourself with the Metene Shower Brush and experience the ultimate in skin care and exfoliation.

Get yours today and experience the ultimate shower and bath experience!
